column1: #Text=Azula says : " All right hair , it 's time to face your doom . "
#Text=Ursa says : " What a shame , you always had such beautiful hair . "
#Text=Azula says : " What are you doing here ? "
#Text=Ursa says : " I did n't want to miss my own daughter 's coronation . "
#Text=Azula says : " Do n't pretend to act proud .
#Text=All your life you used fear to control people , like your friends Mai and Ty Lee .
#Text=" Azula says : " Well what choice do I have ?!
